description.value:
Granted Powers: Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess.

Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{Sanctuary}
  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.menqakfoa1ftvi3f]{Shield Other}
  • 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.1vh2ewwvzvxunoxk]{Protection from Energy}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.ui70binwqvjsgaam]{Spell Immunity}
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.4k9bh8ny1il2oner]{Spell Resistance}
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.niqxt53lhxrjfaty]{Antimagic Field}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.5w1zrztwbvd6xkgj]{Repulsion}
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.blvetbc929cfx4m8]{Mind Blank}
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.lxxliyxfw9uvbxmt]{Prismatic Sphere}
